Commentary: stays back to a fullish one angling into off stump, brings his bat down hurriedly to defend. Did it keep a touch low too?
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

Commentary: a little fuller, similar line, clipped to mid-on
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

Commentary: lovely full length, not up there for the drive but getting the batsman coming half forward, angling in towards off stump. Defended off the inside half of the bat towards midwicket
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

Commentary: fullish again, on that off-stump line, clipped to midwicket
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

Commentary: drifts a little straighter, onto middle and leg, clipped to the right of midwicket
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length, angling into off stump, gets behind it to work it to the right of midwicket
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: length ball, fifth-stump line, a bit of gentle outswing. Left alone
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, no run

Commentary: shortish, a bit of width, Ambris cuts hard but straight to backward point
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, no run

Commentary: fuller now, angling into off stump and swinging away late. Presses hesitantly forward and pokes at it in defence, and the ball swerves past his outside edge
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, no run

Commentary: length ball close to off stump, blocked into the covers
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, no run

Commentary: shortish in the corridor, lets it come on and guides it down to third man
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length on middle stump, looks to pick up a single to the right of midwicket but the fielder closes down the ball quickly
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, no run

Commentary: length ball angling in towards off stump, defended to short extra-cover
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, no run

Commentary: a bit fuller, on middle stump, uses his wrists to turn it to midwicket
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, no run

Commentary: there's the first boundary. After hugging that off-stump line so tightly, Mashrafe sends down a wide half-volley, and Ambris drives with high left elbow, into the gap between short extra-cover and mid-off
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, FOUR runs

Commentary: length ball on off stump, clipped watchfully to midwicket
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, no run

Commentary: full outside off, and Ambris looks for another big cover drive. The line's closer to off stump this time, and he ends up hitting too early, with the bottom hand creeping in, and he loses his shape and drags it through square leg instead
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, 3 runs

Commentary: back of a length on off stump, blocked to midwicket
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

Commentary: shortish, not too much width, chopped to backward point
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, no run

Commentary: fullish outswinger, fourth-stump line, gets on the front foot to block it back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, no run

Commentary: back of a length close to off stump, gets back and across and defends towards the non-striker
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, no run

Commentary: stays back to a length ball on off stump, defends with soft hands into the on side
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, no run

Commentary: back of a length, not too far outside off. Stays leg-side of the ball this time and runs it down to third man
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length on off stump, clipped to midwicket off the back foot
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, no run

Commentary: back of a length close to off stump, gets on top of the bounce and chops it down to backward point
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, no run

Commentary: extra bounce. The line was there for the cut, but perhaps not the length. Ambris ended up pressing half-forward to play the shot, and the ball rose past his outside edge
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, no run

Commentary: short on off stump, but square leg is back on the boundary and this nicely timed pull goes straight to the fielder
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length, drifts onto the pads, worked to deep square leg
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: shortish outside off, rolls his wrists over on top of the bounce and cuts to the right of third man
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length on off stump, hops to ride the bounce and whips it to the right of midwicket
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: shot! That's a good-length ball, just outside off, with a bit of outswing on it, and Hope leans his weight into the ball and uses his wrists to flick-drive between the bowler and mid-off
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, FOUR runs

Commentary: back of a length on off stump, defended to short extra-cover
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, no run

Commentary: there's that flick-drive again. A length ball on a fourth-stump line, and he gets on the front foot and puts it away between bowler and mid-off. May have rolled his wrists over because the ball stopped on him a bit
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, FOUR runs

Commentary: nice-looking shot. Length ball, on off stump, shows the full face and punches to cover point
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, no run

Commentary: length ball, loses his line a bit and slides down the leg side. Too far away from Hope to connect with the flick
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, 1 wide

Commentary: gentle outswinger fairly wide of off, gets on the front foot to drive to mid-off with a flat bat
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, no run

Commentary: back of a length on off stump, and that's a lovely shot, clipped away off the back foot to the right of midwicket, and Mustafizur doesn't quite put in the greatest of efforts, diving left after a big sprint from deep square leg
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, FOUR runs

Commentary: good length again from Mashrafe, dabbed away on the off-side for a single
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: on off stump again - Mashrafe has been excellent with his lines and lengths so far, this was slightly short, but not really. Played away to cover.
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

Commentary: good length again from Mashrafe, cutting in to the batsman a bit too, and Hope misses with his pull
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

Commentary: short of length, slightly outside off and played away to the right of cover point for a single
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: Short again, into the body, and Ambris connects with the pull, goes for a single
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: pushes the length forward a bit, Hope got out of shape a bit there, and the cut turned into a slap for nothing
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

Commentary: On off stump, the wonderful spot on the pitch he has hit time and again, shaping away a bit and left well alone
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, no run

Commentary: the shot was probably on there, but less across the line and more through or over covers; pitched up, shaping away, and Ambris connects with air with his swipe
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, no run

Commentary: shorter this time, and cut away for a single behind square
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: did that keep a bit low? angled into the body and flicked away for a single to the right of the midwicket fielder
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: shaping in this time, and cramping the batsman for a room a bit there; no harm done though
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, no run

Commentary: outside off again, slightly shorter, finding that line from earlier in the over again, and cut away to third man for a single to end the over
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: good length outside off, and that is cut away without any bother, it goes to the third man fielder for a single
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: good line - outside off, and an excellent length, which doesn't give the batsman any room to send it past the point fielder
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

Commentary: Pitched up on off this time, and it's a chance missed perhaps; the drive goes only as far as mid-off and they scamper across for a quick single
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: angled in this time, and Ambris gets it away to deep square-leg for a single this time
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: slight misfield by the midwicket fielder, who dives over the ball to let this flick from Hope - angled in again from Mashrafe - go for a single
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: shorter outside off from Mashrafe, and it's dabbed away for a single to third man
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length on off stump, defended towards mid-on
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, no run

Commentary: length ball close to off stump, stays on the back foot and waits, and taps down on top of the bounce to guide it into the gap to the left of backward point
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: shot! That's brilliant from Hope. Saifuddin drifts onto the pads and thinks to himself, damn, that's going for four. Nope. Hope flicks it away, and times it so well that it carries all the way over the backward square leg boundary
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, SIX runs

Commentary: on the pads again, a little shorter, clipped to the left of short fine leg
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length, nips back in towards off and middle as he tries to stay leg-side of the ball to guide it down to third man, as he likes to do. Ambris is instead forced to play a defensive punch to mid-off
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, no run

Commentary: full on middle stump, chipped away over wide mid-on, and they run three by the time deep square leg makes the long journey to his left
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, 3 runs

Commentary: length ball angling into middle stump, shows the full face for a push down the ground, to the left of mid-on. Mashrafe does the chasing himself
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length on off stump, keeps a bit low. Hope is jumping and crouching all at once, punches to the left of mid-on. They start running, and then turn back when the fielder makes an excellent diving save
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

Commentary: good length, a bit too much width, flat-batted up and over the gap to the left of mid-off
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, FOUR runs

Commentary: length ball, fourth-stump line, punched to the right of deep cover point
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 2 runs

Commentary: back of a length, nips in slightly towards off stump, punched to short extra-cover
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

Commentary: shortish on off stump, hops to ride the bounce and defend towards backward point
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

Commentary: back of a length on off stump, looks for that late dab again to third man. and gully throws himself to his right to intercept
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, no run

Commentary: shortish on off stump, and he jumps on that slight error in length, opens up at the hips and swats it away through the vacant midwicket region - big gap there to enable that fielder at gully
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, FOUR runs

Commentary: bouncer, gets up to chest height on off stump, sways away from the line
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, no run

Commentary: overpitched, lots of width, and Ambris hardly has to move his feet to clatter that over mid-off
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, FOUR runs

Commentary: four more, that's the third of the over. Short now, not a bad ball, gets up around the left shoulder, but Ambris deals with it beautifully, swivels and rolls his wrists over on top of the bounce to keep it down and find the gap to the right of deep square leg
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, FOUR runs

Commentary: another bouncer, this one's angling away outside off, left alone
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, no run

Commentary: tossed up full on middle and off, driven to long-on
Commentary_short: Mosaddek Hossain to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length, not too far outside off, makes a bit of room and slaps to extra-cover
Commentary_short: Mosaddek Hossain to Ambris, no run

Commentary: shortish, ends up turning down the leg side, can't connect with the pull
Commentary_short: Mosaddek Hossain to Ambris, 1 wide

Commentary: slower and fuller, on middle and leg, clipped away through square leg
Commentary_short: Mosaddek Hossain to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: shot! That's not a short ball, it's a good-length ball spinning in towards middle stump, and he clears his front leg, bends at the knees to get down low, and pulls firmly to deep square leg
Commentary_short: Mosaddek Hossain to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length on middle stump, whipped to deep square leg
Commentary_short: Mosaddek Hossain to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: length ball turning in towards leg stump, excellent fielding from Mehidy at straight midwicket - the offspinner's best friend - to dive left and intercept the attempted punch to long-on
Commentary_short: Mosaddek Hossain to Hope, no run

Commentary: back of a length outside off, punched to the left of long-on
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Ambris, 2 runs

Commentary: nicely flighted on off stump, gets forward to clip it down to long-on
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: length ball outside off, makes a bit of room and slaps it away to the left of deep extra-cover
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 2 runs

Commentary: tossed up nicely on off stump, gets a bit of dip, stretches out to push into the covers
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: nicely flighted again, outside off, blocked back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Ambris, no run

Commentary: flighted ball, a little wider, stretches out to drive it back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Ambris, no run

Commentary: length ball on middle and leg, clipped to the right of deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Mosaddek Hossain to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: flighted ball wide of off, leans over the ball and uses his wrists to work it through midwicket
Commentary_short: Mosaddek Hossain to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: full on off stump, driven to long-on
Commentary_short: Mosaddek Hossain to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: dangled up full on off stump. Ambris closes his bat face early, and ends up popping a leading edge at dangerously catching height, far enough to the left of the bowler, though
Commentary_short: Mosaddek Hossain to Ambris, no run

Commentary: back of a length on off stump, punched to long-off
Commentary_short: Mosaddek Hossain to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length on off stump, makes some room and punches straight to cover
Commentary_short: Mosaddek Hossain to Hope, no run

Commentary: flat length ball on off stump, punched firmly and point moves quickly to his right to half-stop it
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: tossed up outside off, nice stretch forward to drive to long-off
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: nice flight on off stump, dips a bit as he comes forward to drive to long-off. Turns in and goes to long-on off the inside half of the bat
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: full on middle stump, nice stride forward to clip to midwicket
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

Commentary: length ball on middle stump, clipped to midwicket
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

Commentary: tossed up full on off stump, driven to long-off
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: appeal for lbw as Hope closes his bat face too early for the front-foot flick. Probably pitched outside leg
Commentary_short: Sabbir Rahman to Hope, no run

Commentary: length ball on middle stump, makes room to drive inside-out to the left of long-off
Commentary_short: Sabbir Rahman to Hope, 2 runs

Commentary: tossed up outside off, driven to sweeper cover
Commentary_short: Sabbir Rahman to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: full on middle stump, jabbed back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Sabbir Rahman to Ambris, no run

Commentary: back of a length on off stump, chopped to backward point
Commentary_short: Sabbir Rahman to Ambris, no run

Commentary: back of a length on middle and off, punched to long-on
Commentary_short: Sabbir Rahman to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: full, just outside off, and angling away. Driven away from his body to extra cover
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length, on middle and getting big on Hope. Uncomfortably defended to the leg side
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

Commentary: slower ball, full and wide, and he throws his hands at this ball. Slapped through the covers, and wide long off has no chance
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, FOUR runs

Commentary: full, just outside off, and he leans forward to crunch a drive. Finds mid-off though
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

Commentary: and that's fifty! Full, on off, and he swings this over the bowler's head. Hits the sightscreen
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, SIX runs

Commentary: length ball, just outside off, and cut behind square to the fielder at third man. Fielder runs across the boundary to intercept
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 2 runs

Commentary: full on leg, and spinning into his pads. Ambris in two minds trying to flick/paddle. Ball hits his pads and rolls away. That was not attractive!
Commentary_short: Sabbir Rahman to Ambris, no run

Commentary: length, just outside off and turning away. Cut square to deep point
Commentary_short: Sabbir Rahman to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: muscles a pull over the infield to deep midwicket. Half-tracker on middle, and turning in
Commentary_short: Sabbir Rahman to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: flighted, full toss on off, and driven to wide long off. Terrific stop from the fielder in the deep, and that's fifty for Ambris!
Commentary_short: Sabbir Rahman to Ambris, 2 runs

Commentary: half-tracker, just outside off, and the back foot punch finds the bat's outside edge. Races away past short third-man, and the fielder's chase is futile
Commentary_short: Sabbir Rahman to Ambris, FOUR runs

Commentary: length ball on leg, and the attempted leg-side paddle comes off his thigh guard. Rolls away to short fine leg
Commentary_short: Sabbir Rahman to Ambris, 1 leg bye

Commentary: length ball on middle, and angling away. Tries to cut square to deep point
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: drilled past the umpire! He does well to get out of the ball's way. Full, wide outside off, and he flat-bats a slogged shot between the non-striker's stumps and umpire Reynolds
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, FOUR runs

Commentary: play and a miss from Hope. Slower ball angling across Hope, and he tries to play the slog towards midwicket. Misses out this time
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

Commentary: goes short, hurrying Hope to pull. Mistimed to deep midwicket as they scamper across for one
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: that's beautiful! Slower ball, length delivery on leg stump, and he paddles this off his hips to the fine leg boundary. Good use of his wrists
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, FOUR runs

Commentary: back of a length on middle, and the ball takes some extra bounce off the deck. Ambris misses the pull, but the ball soars over him. Wide called
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, 1 wide

Commentary: back of a length on middle, and Ambris is through his pull too early. Ball goes through him, and into the keeper's gloves
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, no run

Commentary: over long on! Full, just outside off, and he's deposited this over the boundary line
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, SIX runs

Commentary: full, just outside off, and driven down the ground to mid-off
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: full, on off, and driven to wide long off for a single
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: full, on middle, and skidding into his pads. Defended towards the leg side
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: arm ball, full on middle, and flicked to midwicket. They scamper across for one
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: full, just outside leg, and the ball hits his thigh guard. Rolls away to short fine leg
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 leg bye

Commentary: full toss, just outside off, and punched to wide mid-off for a single
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: full, on middle, but he's overstepped! Driven to long on. Massive no-ball
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, (no ball) 1 run

Commentary: full, on off, and he slaps a drive to the fielder manning the long-off boundary. Nearly a yorker
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: another full toss angling away, and he mistimes a square drive to point. Misfield allows them to pinch a single. The fielder saves three runs though
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: yorker, on leg, and dug away to wide long on. They race across for one
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: slower ball, full outside off and angling further away. Ambris reaches out to drive, misses
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, no run

Commentary: play and a miss again. Teasing offcutter angling away from Ambris. Tries to cut, but can't get bat on ball
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, no run

Commentary: full, just outside off, and slapped down to long off for a single
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: full, on leg, and driven back to Ambris. Well stopped by Mehidy diving to his right
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Ambris, no run

Commentary: length ball on middle, and flicked to midwicket
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: loose shot! And taken by Mosaddek at long on. Tries to slog this over midwicket, but Mosaddek gets under it, takes a catch, throws it in the air because he was going over the boundary, and finally recovers to complete the catch
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, OUT
Dismissal_text: SD Hope c Mosaddek Hossain b Mehidy Hasan Miraz 74 (64b 6x4 3x6) SR: 115.62

Commentary: full on leg, and he inside-edges a shot onto his pads. Tidy
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Ambris, no run

Commentary: terrific over! full, on middle, and all Ambris can do is work it towards midwicket
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Ambris, no run

Commentary: back of a length, wide outside off, and he drags a pull along the ground to deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Bravo, 2 runs

Commentary: back of a length, wide outside off, and left alone. Umpire reckons it's a legal ball.
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Bravo, no run

Commentary: back of a length, just outside off, and pulled to the sweeper-fielder on the leg side one more time
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Bravo, 1 run

Commentary: angling away, length ball, and he slaps a cut shot behind point. Sweeper fielder can't cut it off. WI go past 150
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, FOUR runs

Commentary: yorker, on off, and dug back to Mustafizur
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, no run

Commentary: full and wide outside off. Guided to deep point. West Indies finish on 152 for 1
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, 1 run

Commentary: full, angling into leg stump, clipped to short fine leg
Commentary_short: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length on off stump, makes a bit of room and slashes to backward point
Commentary_short: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: makes plenty of room before the bowler delivers, and receives a back-of-a-length ball on off stump. He's created room to free his arms, and he does just that to lift it effortlessly over the covers. Top shot
Commentary_short: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

Commentary: looks to deny him room this time, and ends up sliding a full one down the leg side, past the attempted sweep
Commentary_short: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, 1 wide

Commentary: full on middle stump, driven back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: full on off stump, and he drives inside-out, into the gap to the right of mid-off
Commentary_short: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

Commentary: flat length ball on off stump, can't make enough room to really give this a proper slap. Stabs it to the man at cover point
Commentary_short: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: poor ball, back of a length and on the pads, and the man at short fine leg does extremely well with a full-length dive to his right to cut off Tamim's flick
Commentary_short: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: short over middle and off, Soumya stays leg-side of the ball while attempting to hook from over his shoulder, cannot connect
Commentary_short: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: full, slanting away into a sixth-stump line. Reaches out to drive but can't connect, and it's called wide
Commentary_short: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, 1 wide

Commentary: shortish, straightens towards leg stump to tuck Soumya up for room. Jabs it away to backward point
Commentary_short: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: edged, and it's wide of the keeper! Shortish, angling away from off stump. Not too much room, and I think he was trying to dab it past the wide slip, ended up edging it much finer than intended, past the left glove of the diving keeper
Commentary_short: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

Commentary: excellent bouncer, rising steeply over leg stump, and Soumya falls over backwards, literally, to evade it. Did well to keep his eye on the ball though
Commentary_short: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: length ball angling away from off stump, and the previous ball slowed down Soumya's front-foot movement to this one. A little late coming forward to push into the point region, and the ball slides past his open bat face
Commentary_short: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: back of a length on off stump, tucked away with soft hands through square leg, and the man has to come in a long way off the boundary so they can run two
Commentary_short: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

Commentary: sharp short ball creates the chance, and Ashley Nurse puts down a dolly! It's up at shoulder height and he's caught between pulling and fending, and in the end he sends it ballooning up towards short third man. Nurse gets right under it, gets both hands to it, and puts it down
Commentary_short: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: bang. Full on middle stump, and he clears his front leg and launches it cleanly over the wide long-on boundary
Commentary_short: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, SIX runs

Commentary: different length, similar region, four more. Back of a length, on middle and leg, and he clears his front leg and swats it away over midwicket
Commentary_short: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

Commentary: back of a length on off stump, and he pulls fiercely again, can't beat the man at midwicket
Commentary_short: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: back of a length, lots of width, cracked away past the tumbling fielder at backward point. Was that a misfield?
Commentary_short: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

Commentary: back of a length on off stump, nudged away quietly through midwicket to bring Soumya back on strike
Commentary_short: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: shot! Soumya's batting on another planet here. Short, angling away from off stump, gets up to chest height, and he picks the length so quickly, he's able to meet it well in front of his body with a full extension of his arms, and pull it all the way over the square midwicket boundary
Commentary_short: Gabriel to Soumya Sarkar, SIX runs

Commentary: shortish on off stump, lets it come on and uses the pace to guide it down to third man
Commentary_short: Gabriel to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: length ball close to off stump, jumps across and dabs gently into the covers
Commentary_short: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: what a brilliant shot that is! Length ball angling across into a fifth-stump line, and Soumya takes a big step back and across, head nice and still right through, and then flicks it away to the right of the short fine leg fielder
Commentary_short: Gabriel to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

Commentary: short, angling away into a fairly wide line outside off. Looks to open his bat face and ramp it over the wide slip, but can't put bat to ball
Commentary_short: Gabriel to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: length ball angling across to off stump. Takes a big step back and across, then forward and across, and drives to the left of mid-on
Commentary_short: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: length ball on middle stump, stays leg-side of the ball and bunts it gently into the off side with soft hands. They quickly decide on the quick single, and Tamim makes it easily to the striker's end, defying Holder's attempt to kick the ball into the stumps, which misses anyway
Commentary_short: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: down the track comes Tamim, and Holder slants it wide of off stump. Goes for the big flat-bat hit over the covers, fails to connect
Commentary_short: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: short on off stump, takes a big step across and pulls in the air, on the bounce to the left of deep square leg
Commentary_short: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length on off stump, opens his bat face and steers to third man. That brings up Bangladesh's 50
Commentary_short: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: again short on off stump, and again he looks to shuffle across and pull. He's looking to go over short fine leg, but can't get it as fine as he'd like, or off the middle of his bat either, and it lands somewhere between that fielder and the man at deep square leg
Commentary_short: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: bang. Length ball angling across to off stump, and he takes a step out of his crease, moving away from the line to make himself swinging room, and smacks it between the umpire and the non-striker
Commentary_short: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

Commentary: four more. Down the track again, making a lot of room again, and he lofts the leg-stump length ball up and over wide mid-off. Doesn't quite middle it, but he gets it well over the fielder in the circle
Commentary_short: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

Commentary: down the track again, and this time Gabriel bangs it in short, invites Tamim to hit the shoulder-high ball over mid-off. Goes through with the shot, ends up hitting it high rather than far, and he ends up hitting it down the throat of Holder at mid-off. An exchange of words between Gabriel and Tamim as he makes his way off the ground
Commentary_short: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, OUT
Dismissal_text: Tamim Iqbal c Holder b Gabriel 18 (13b 2x4 0x6) SR: 138.46

Commentary: back of a length close to off stump, lets it come on and dabs to third man
Commentary_short: Gabriel to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: bouncer angling down leg, misses the hook. Not called wide - wasn't too far from leg stump and he'd taken a step across anyway
Commentary_short: Gabriel to Sabbir Rahman, no run

Commentary: big appeal, given! Back of a length, and it nips in and keeps a touch low, maybe. Looks to work it leg side and the ball beats his inside edge and hits front pad. Given out by Richard Kettleborough, and there's no DRS, so Sabbir will have to walk back even though it may juuust have been going down leg. We'll have to watch a few replays to know for sure
Commentary_short: Gabriel to Sabbir Rahman, OUT
Dismissal_text: Sabbir Rahman lbw b Gabriel 0 (2b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

Commentary: overpitched, lots of width, and even though cover point is out on the boundary there's no stopping this drive, timed so sweetly into the gap to the left of the fielder
Commentary_short: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

Commentary: fullish on off stump, and Soumya kind of outsmarts himself by taking a big, premeditated step back into his crease. Gets a touch too far underneath the ball in the attempt to hit over mid-off, so he doesn't quite get the desired power on it, but it doesn't matter. Clears the fielder and rolls down to the boundary
Commentary_short: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

Commentary: length ball angling away from off stump, big slash and miss with an angled bat
Commentary_short: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: back of a length, angling away from off stump, steered down to third man
Commentary_short: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: shortish on middle stump, a bit of extra bounce, drops the bottom hand while defending back towards the bowler
Commentary_short: Holder to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: back of a length on middle and leg, tucked away to fine leg
Commentary_short: Holder to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length, angling into the pads, clipped away through square leg
Commentary_short: Gabriel to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length on middle stump, looks to stay leg-side of the ball and dab into the backward point region - the fielder moves in quickly and denies the single
Commentary_short: Gabriel to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: that's Bangladesh's fourth-fastest ODI fifty. Shortish, a bit of width, has to reach for the ball and he carves it over backward point, to the left of third man
Commentary_short: Gabriel to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: short, gets up to shoulder height on off stump, and Mushfiqur controls his hook really well to hit it along the ground to deep square leg
Commentary_short: Gabriel to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: bam, Shoulder-high short ball close to off stump, and he seems to be expecting it, pulls it in the air, over midwicket
Commentary_short: Gabriel to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

Commentary: shortish close to off stump, chopped down to third man, rolling his wrists over on top of the bounce
Commentary_short: Gabriel to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length, slanting away into a fifth-stump line. Looks for the front-foot pull and misses
Commentary_short: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: brilliant. Short, waist-high ball on off stump, and this is a straight-bat pull, almost a scoop over midwicket, and he easily clears the boundary
Commentary_short: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, SIX runs

Commentary: length ball slanting across the stumps, looks to slog across the line and inside-edges into his pad
Commentary_short: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: shortish on off stump, pulled in the air, but on the bounce, to deep midwicket. He's got to be careful with this shot now that that fielder has dropped back
Commentary_short: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: short ball on off stump, rises pretty steeply, and it looks like he was early on the pull. The ball misses his top edge and hits him on the grille of the helmet. Doesn't spend too long nursing his wound. Takes his helmet off, checks if the grille is fastened properly, gives his head a bit of a shake, and puts it back on
Commentary_short: Roach to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: what a reply. Another short ball, a little bit wider of off stump, and he pulls it all the way over the square leg boundary
Commentary_short: Roach to Mushfiqur Rahim, SIX runs

Commentary: short outside off, extra bounce beats the attempted uppercut
Commentary_short: Reifer to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: slower length ball close to off stump, lets it come on and plays his favourite dab to third man, off the front foot this time
Commentary_short: Reifer to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length outside off, stabbed to the left of deep point
Commentary_short: Reifer to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: steps away from leg stump premeditatedly, creates a lot of room, and Reifer bowls a full slower ball, much slower than his typical pace, outside off. Reaches for it and bottom-edges past his leg stump
Commentary_short: Reifer to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: length ball wide of off stump, carved to deep point
Commentary_short: Reifer to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: short slower one outside off, beats Mushfiqur, who's through his pull too early.
Commentary_short: Reifer to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: full, on off, and lifted over the bowler's head. Long off there
Commentary_short: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: nice! Full, on leg, and the attempted sweep is played pretty fine. Short fine leg can't cut it off, and neither can deep square leg
Commentary_short: Nurse to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

Commentary: team hundred! That's the fastest hundred in Bangladesh's ODI history. Full, on off, and reverse swept to the deep point region
Commentary_short: Nurse to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: length ball, on middle and angling in. Sarkar walks down the ground, and punches to mid on
Commentary_short: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: length ball, just outside off, and slapped over the infield to deep point
Commentary_short: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: length ball, just outside off, and cut square to Allen at deep point
Commentary_short: Nurse to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: paddled over the keeper! Length ball on middle, and Mushfiqur opens his chest to play that shot. Finds the ball near his chest, and comfortably paddles it over Hope's head
Commentary_short: Reifer to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

Commentary: length ball, just outside off, and guided to third man for a single
Commentary_short: Reifer to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: slower ball, but wayward. Very wide outside off
Commentary_short: Reifer to Soumya Sarkar, 1 wide

Commentary: another one! Faster from Reifer, but too wide outside off stump. Left alone by Sarkar
Commentary_short: Reifer to Soumya Sarkar, 1 wide

Commentary: full, very wide outside off, and he throws his hands at this. Tries to slap it over long off, but toe-ends the shot. Cottrell makes no mistake running in from long off. Replays suggest that Reifer had overstepped but a closer look suggests that it's a legal ball. The foot had dragged out of the crease after the initial contact with the ground. Huge wicket
Commentary_short: Reifer to Soumya Sarkar, OUT
Dismissal_text: Soumya Sarkar c sub (SS Cottrell) b Reifer 66 (41b 9x4 3x6) SR: 160.97

Commentary: length ball, angling in from around the wicket. Nudged off his hips to fine leg
Commentary_short: Reifer to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: full, outside off, and driven to the deep cover boundary
Commentary_short: Reifer to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

Commentary: slower ball, full on middle, and worked off his hips to fine leg
Commentary_short: Reifer to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: full, outside leg stump, and he tees off to slog behind square. Goes down the leg side
Commentary_short: Nurse to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 wide

Commentary: over cow corner! Settles on one knee, and deposits this full ball into the stands
Commentary_short: Nurse to Mushfiqur Rahim, SIX runs

Commentary: length ball, on off and angling across the right-hander. Cut to deep point. Excellent effort in the deep ensures it doesn't go for four. Allen the man
Commentary_short: Nurse to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

Commentary: half-tracker on leg, and he rocks back to pull. Played along the ground to deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Nurse to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: crucial! Full on middle, and he switches his grip to play an exquisite reverse paddle past short third man
Commentary_short: Nurse to Mohammad Mithun, FOUR runs

Commentary: full, on leg, and clipped to deep midwicket. Smart cricket
Commentary_short: Nurse to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

Commentary: scooped over the keeper but Cottrell - from short third man - runs across to cut it off
Commentary_short: Nurse to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

Commentary: back of a length on off, and pulled to fine leg
Commentary_short: Reifer to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

Commentary: full, on off, and flicked off his pads to midwicket. Protection there
Commentary_short: Reifer to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: slower ball, back of a length outside off. Flicked away to fine leg
Commentary_short: Reifer to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length, just outside off, and pulled to square leg
Commentary_short: Reifer to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: full, just outside off, and tapped to cover
Commentary_short: Reifer to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

Commentary: full, on middle, and he tries to nudge it to the leg side, but Mushfiqur is through his shot too early and this has hit him plumb in front of middle
Commentary_short: Reifer to Mushfiqur Rahim, OUT
Dismissal_text: Mushfiqur Rahim lbw b Reifer 36 (22b 2x4 2x6) SR: 163.63

Commentary: length ball, just outside off, and punched to extra cover for a couple
Commentary_short: Roach to Mohammad Mithun, 2 runs

Commentary: back of a length, just outside off, and tapped off the back foot to point
Commentary_short: Roach to Mohammad Mithun, no run

Commentary: full, on off, and tapped off the front foot
Commentary_short: Roach to Mohammad Mithun, no run

Commentary: length ball, on off, and fended off the front foot. Back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Roach to Mohammad Mithun, no run

Commentary: length ball outside off, but Mithun walks across the stumps and then lifts a slog over square leg
Commentary_short: Roach to Mohammad Mithun, SIX runs

Commentary: length ball on off, and worked off his pads to the leg side
Commentary_short: Roach to Mohammad Mithun, no run
Allen to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: length ball, just outside off, and cut square to deep point
Commentary_short: Allen to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: full, just outside off, and he goes for an expansive sweep. Misses, and Hope whips the bails off. Is he stumped? No, back leg was inside the crease
Commentary_short: Allen to Mohammad Mithun, no run

Commentary: slow finger of death! Mithun trying to reverse paddle, and pays the price for it. Length ball angling in, and hitting his front leg. Would've gone on to clip middle stump. Another one gone
Commentary_short: Allen to Mohammad Mithun, OUT
Dismissal_text: Mohammad Mithun lbw b Allen 17 (14b 1x4 1x6) SR: 121.42

Commentary: length ball, on off, and nudged off his hips to deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Allen to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

Commentary: tossed up, just outside off, and drilled to deep extra cover
Commentary_short: Allen to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: length ball, wide enough to cut square to point
Commentary_short: Roach to Mahmudullah, 1 run
Roach to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run
Roach to Mahmudullah, no run
Roach to Mahmudullah, 1 run
Roach to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

Commentary: over ruined! Struck through square leg
Commentary_short: Roach to Mosaddek Hossain, FOUR runs

Commentary: full, on off, and drilled to long off for a walking single
Commentary_short: Allen to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: length ball, just outside off, tapped away to point
Commentary_short: Allen to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

Commentary: length ball, just outside off, and guided to point off the back foot
Commentary_short: Allen to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

Commentary: fullish, outside off again. Guided to point, but can't find the gap
Commentary_short: Allen to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

Commentary: length ball on middle, and angling in. Flicked off his pads to square leg
Commentary_short: Allen to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

Commentary: stopped at wide long off! Full, outside off, and confidently lofted over extra cover
Commentary_short: Allen to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: nearly a yorker, just outside off. Dug away to third man
Commentary_short: Holder to Mahmudullah, 1 run
Holder to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

Commentary: over square leg! Length ball, outside off stump, and he drags a pull from outside off stump. Flies over the fielder in the deep
Commentary_short: Holder to Mosaddek Hossain, SIX runs

Commentary: full toss, on his hips, and clipped to deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Holder to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

Commentary: full, on off, and worked off his pads to square leg
Commentary_short: Holder to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: another full toss on off, and punched to mid-off. He keeps strike
Commentary_short: Holder to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

Commentary: length ball, angling in, and flicked off his hips to square leg
Commentary_short: Allen to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

Commentary: full, on off, and the leg-side clip takes a leading edge to point instead
Commentary_short: Allen to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: length ball angling in, and muscled off the back foot to wide long on
Commentary_short: Allen to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

Commentary: full outside off, and he tries to slog towards the leg side. Sliced, but safely near extra cover
Commentary_short: Allen to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: full, on off, and pushed into the off side. Chase the man riding the boundary
Commentary_short: Allen to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run
Allen to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: full, and very wide outside off. He gets down on one knee, and drives to long off
Commentary_short: Roach to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: much needed six! In the slot outside off, nad Mosaddek stays on the back foot before muscling a lofted shot over extra cover. Powerful
Commentary_short: Roach to Mosaddek Hossain, SIX runs

Commentary: nearly a yorker, just outside off, and guided down to third man
Commentary_short: Roach to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

Commentary: full toss, wide outside off, but manages to drag a shot to wide long on. Can't keep it down to a single
Commentary_short: Roach to Mahmudullah, 2 runs

Commentary: full, wide outside off, and he flays a square drive. Stopped by the sweeper-fielder on the off side
Commentary_short: Roach to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: yorker, on off. Dug away to third man
Commentary_short: Roach to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

Commentary: switch hit for six! Half-tracker on middle, but he goes left-handed right away, and then slogs it over the point boundary for half-a-dozen. How about that?
Commentary_short: Allen to Mosaddek Hossain, SIX runs

Commentary: Hossain the hero! Full, on off, and he comes down the wicket to lift a six over long off! The crowd's ecstatic
Commentary_short: Allen to Mosaddek Hossain, SIX runs

Commentary: another one! Bangladesh are romping home now. Quicker from Allen, and Mosaddek is halfway down the track, but he sticks his bat out to play a late cut for four. Delicate
Commentary_short: Allen to Mosaddek Hossain, FOUR runs

Commentary: holy guacamole! Full, on leg, and Mosaddek exposes all three stumps before playing a beautiful inside-out six over cover
Commentary_short: Allen to Mosaddek Hossain, SIX runs

Commentary: length ball on middle, and clipped off his pads to deep midwicket. Half-century for Mosaddek
Commentary_short: Allen to Mosaddek Hossain, 2 runs

Commentary: length ball on middle, and tucked away to square leg. He'll keep strike
Commentary_short: Allen to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

Commentary: full, just outside off, and tapped to cover
Commentary_short: Reifer to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

Commentary: length ball, just outside off and going through to the keeper
Commentary_short: Reifer to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

Commentary: slower ball, full outside off, and driven to deep point. Scores are level
Commentary_short: Reifer to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

Commentary: length ball, on off, and he defends!
Commentary_short: Reifer to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: Bangladesh win their first ever ODI tournament final! Historic as Mahmudullah crashes a cover drive through the off side
Commentary_short: Reifer to Mahmudullah, FOUR runs
